derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Latin from Greek hippopotamos, earlier hippos ho potamios 'river horse' (from hippos 'horse', potamos 'river')

entry.def: A hippopotamus is a very large African animal with short legs and thick, hairless skin. Hippopotamuses live in and near rivers.

means.word_mean: 1. massive thick-skinned herbivorous animal living in or around rivers of tropical Africa
